actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to give the Secretary of State responsibility for monitoring the overseas business activities of American companies in order to detect any violations of Federal law and to make it unlawful for an American company to bribe any foreign official.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of State to monitor the overseas business activities of American companies and to report any possible violation of Federal law by such companies to the appropriate Federal agency. Makes it unlawful for an American company to bribe any foreign official.

titles.title: A bill to give the Secretary of State responsibility for monitoring the overseas business activities of American companies in order to detect any violations of Federal law and to make it unlawful for an American company to bribe any foreign official.
